item.description: I've been waiting for some snow (natuarl preferred) for skiing this year. Looks like it's about as good as it's gonna get. I have off Mon and Tuesday. I'm looking at Sunapee on Monday (since it's $39) and Killington on Tuesday (I'll post that seperately). If no one is up for either of those, I might also just do Dartmouth Skiway.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Monday..Ski Mt. Sunapee (or...?)
